law.catch_line: State educational institution may convey building site.
law.text: For the purpose of providing buildings to be used in connection with any state educational institution, the governing body of the institution may convey to any person complying with KRS 162.320 and 162.330 a fee simple title, with covenant of general warranty of title, to real estate held by or for the institution, as a site for the buildings.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 572, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4535cc-1.
